summary: A Knights Templar meets a mysterious Muslim in the desert where they find refuge in an oasis with beautiful woman. As the Knight falls for the woman, he questions himself but the Muslim holds a secret that will change their lives for ever.
cast: Tim Abell|Bill Mendieta|Mapi Galán|Nicholas Kadi|Scott Cleverdon|Hani Naimi|Woody Adams|Mercedez Alexander|Richard Alsabery|Ron Baker|Brandon Beebe|William Best|Paul Michael Bloodgood|Jessica Cail|Andreas Cederlund|Fernando Chien|Kit Davlin|Justin DeNino|Jeanne Desilets|Anthony Eikner|Charles Fathy|James Foster-Keddie|David Franco|Elizabeth Frank|Robert Gantzos|Kast Hasa|Sam Hennings|David Huyah|Taliesin Jaffe|Paul Jene|Daron Jones|Delbert Jones|Jamison Jones|Steve Kim|Geoffrey C. title: Soldado de Dios
